list.name: Changes
list.comment:
✨ feat(graph): add chart component
This commit adds a new chart component to the metrics graph page. The chart component uses the recharts library to display a line chart. The chart shows the average and today's values for a set of data points.
The chart component is defined in the `frontend/app/(core)/metrics/graph/page.tsx` file. It uses the `LineChart`, `Line`, `XAxis`, `YAxis`, `Tooltip`, and `Legend` components from the recharts library.
The chart component receives data as a prop and renders the line chart with the provided data. The data is an array of objects, each representing a data point with an average and today's value.
The chart component is wrapped in a `div` with the class `h-screen; w-screen bg-amber-400` to style its appearance. The chart itself is contained within a `div` with the class `bg-green-300`.
The line chart has a width of
